title: Spamming on Typophile :(
content:
It seems to me that Typophile is being hit by spammers lately posting blogs full of nonsense generated text and probably dodgy links. They usually give themselves away by their strange titles, so I could ignore them, but they really annoy me, and I hope you can do something about it! Thanks :)

I guess I could have sent this to the admin as well, but I guess it's good to warn all beforehand.

Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131121857/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress/)
author: Queneau

comments.content: Clicking the profile link of a known typophile moderator and sending them an email is the quickest way (and most approved way) to get rid of the offending posts.
Yes, please let me or another mod know and we will kill that spam.

_Clicking the profile link of a known typophile moderator and sending them an email..._

Here is the list of Typophile moderators:

[http://typophile.com/moderators](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131121857/http:/typophile.com/moderators "http://typophile.com/moderators")

Thanks all,

I will do so the next time I run into spam!

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131121857/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)
